text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-alemtuzumab-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-anti-thymocyte-globulin-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-bortezomib-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-busulfan-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-carmustine-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-cyclophosphamide-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-cytarabine-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-defibrotide-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-etoposide-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-fludarabine-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-melphalan-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-rituximab-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-thiotepa-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-treosulfan-vs
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-ursodiol-vs
